name: Bloody Nightshift
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THE TERROR OF BLOODY NIGHTSHIFT? ABOUT :
  • This game is stronly inspired by ps1 and PuppetCombo games,
  • This game is made in unity,
  • I used sounds from https://freesound.org/,
DOWNLOAD :

After downloading this game you will get zip files, you need to export them, and you can play!

GAMEPLAY : W, S, A, DMOVEMENTLEFT MOUSE BUTTONINTERACTSPACECHANGE DIALOG1,2,3 CHANGE THINGS IN HANDESCAPEQUITU (with key in hand)LOCK AND UNLOCK THE DOOR

UPDATE!! - check post to find out what have changed

Game lenght : >5 minutes
